text: Ðis syndon þa landgemæro to ceorles wyrðe.

Of caforda andlang cwyrnburnan<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð to mannan mearce þonne þanon andlang wealc hyrste forð be anan burnan<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð eft on mannan mearce & on asan þonne þanon andlang heges<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð to anre dene þonne swa forð<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð on þone burnan þe scyt to culan fenne þonne swa forð andlang þæs burnan<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð to oswiðes mearce & eadwoldes.
Þonne forð andlang heges þe scyt of þam burnan<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð to stræte swa forð andlang strete<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð inn on mearcellan.
Þonne forð andlang mearcellan<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð þær cwyrnburna & mearcella sceotað togædere þonne forð andlang cwyrnburnan<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð eft in on caford.
